Text:
LOL!  I'm finally sitting down to watch the episodes and I just realized that Cad Bane's droid (Todo 360) is voiced by Seth Green.

Very nice.
Ahhh ... too bad ... no more Seth Green :(

Nice, I like these two episodes.

Were they aired like this, or does anyone have them separately? Having two episodes merged together in 1 file always messes up my archive system, unless I compensate by subtracting 1 from every episode thereafter (ep3 becomes 2, and so on)

But thanks, this was great to watch :)

I thought about encoding these separately, but I'm still hoping a full-aspect ratio 720p version gets released ... if not, I'm sure I'll re-encode when the season is finished and I re-upload them all together.
